context: The Cooking with Passion – Gary Lengyel Memorial Endowment fund was created in partnership between Peter Lengyel and the Guild Electric Charitable Foundation to support culinary students at George Brown College's Centre for Hospitality and Culinary Arts (CHCA). Gary Lengyel, an avid cook, enrolled in George Brown's Culinary School in 1978. Donors can make a donation to the fund, and 100% of the donation will directly go towards supporting a scholarship. The contact person for inquiries is Allan Penning at allan.penning@georgebrown.ca or 416-415-5000 ext. 3848.
